 put the selected device's serial number (as a null terminated string) into dstBuffer. Buffer must be 16 characters long.

 Display a MFC dialog with diagnostic information about the xitact hardware. Pass the name of the calling application as a parameter. Always return true;.

XIFUNC XiBool xiGetFailedLicenseSerialNumber (int index, char dstBuf[16])
 Retrieve the device serial number associated with a failed license check. index must be in the range [0..LicenseFailedCount).

Detailed Description

Declaration of C interface for Xitact Laparoscopic simulation devices.

Author:
Xavier Michelon, Ivan Vecerina - (C) Xitact S.A. 2003-2007

For comments and technical requests, contact support2007@xitact.com

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
XI_TrocarIsPresent 

Initially set, cleared if the device is disconnected.

XI_TrocarHasHaptics 

Set if the robot is haptic-enabled (i.e. it is an IHP).

XI_TrocarIsInitialized 

If not set, the instrument must be moved to allow determination of its absolute position (see the XI_InitNeed* bits).

XI_ToolIsConnected_OLD 

Set if an instrument handle has been connected (WARNING: this flag is deprecated and should not be used).

XI_ToolIsInserted 

Set if an instrument is currently present in the trocar.

XI_TrocarHasFFBPower 

Set if the power supply for haptic motors is connected to the device.

XI_TrocarHasFFBEnabled 

Set if the robot has internally enabled the force feedback motors.

XI_ToolButtonMain 

Set if main/default instrument button is pressed.

XI_ToolButtonLeft 

Set if left instrument button/footswitch is pressed.

XI_ToolButtonRight 

Set if right instrument button/footswitch is pressed.

XI_InitNeedToolOut 

Indicates that tool needs to be taken out to establish reference depth.

XI_InitNeedLeftIPulse 

Indicates that left index pulse still needs to be detected.

XI_InitNeedRightIPulse 

Indicates that right index pulse still needs to be detected.

anonymous enum
Enumerator:
XI_ToolIDDisconnected 

No tool is connected.

XI_ToolIDHandle 

A handle is connected.

XI_ToolIDReversedHandle 

A reversed handle is connected.

XI_ToolIDCamera 

A camera is connected.

enum XiConnector

enumeration for describing the tool connector

Enumerator:
XI_ConnectorRight 

The right connector of the Robot (looking from behind).

XI_ConnectorLeft 

The left connector of the robot.

enum XiHandleType

Enumeration for describing the type of handle coonected to the device.

Enumerator:
XI_HandleDisconnected 

No handle is connected.

XI_HandleNormal 

A standard handle is connected (open handle is associated with high value).

XI_HandleReversed 

A reversed handle is connected (open handle is associated with low value).

XI_HandleCamera 

A camera is connected.
